Title: A Night to Remember
Plot: Peggy contributes on a church project; Duck and Don try to create market appeal for a foreign beer brand; Harry recruits assistance to help with the workload in his department.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Mark Moses, Colin Hanks, Talia Balsam, Sam Page, Audrey Wasilewski
